NewsArticle.Title: Plamit Village Release Date
NewsArticle.Content:
Plamit Cave Hunting Beta will end on September 19th. Thank you for all the feedback given to us through support tickets and talking to Error. The new area, Plamit Village along with Plamit Cave will officially open on September 19th. All quests and NPCs will be fully functional after the release.
We are also increasing the Ability cap to 95 to accommodate the new items (AB 75-95) you will receive in the quests from the new area.
Future updates to follow: -New Skills/Spells -New Armors
Dark Ages Team
